txt.en: 'The enemy is coming from a side tunnel!'
Cave In
'I can cave in the entrance if you cannot fend off the enemy! Watch my back as I work!'
[placeholder] Barricades Destroyed
'It will take a few minutes to find the right vein.'
[placeholder] Rohirrim Commanders Killed
'The rock here speaks a strange tongue. I need more time.'
[placeholder] Rohirrim Soldiers Defeated
'Ah-ha, there is the vein I'm looking for, now to make it work for us.'
<rgb=#FF0000>Before Gimli is forced to cave in the entrance.</rgb>
'Now we're really getting somewhere. Nearly done!'
Defeated all enemies and protected Gimli
'The enemy is overwhelming us, I must collapse the entrance!'
[placeholder] Barricades Destroyed
'The enemy has been defeated and the cave in is no longer necessary!'
Barricade destroyed
[placeholder]% North Barricade Damage
Commander killed
[placeholder]% South Barricade Damage
Crystal has been damaged
Crystal destroyed
Troll Brute Defeated
Gimli has successfully caved in the tunnel entrance

The enemy has broken through a hidden passageway behind the central Crystal. Gimli reluctantly begins to start caving in the entrance to the passage. Defeat all enemies before Gimli is forced to complete the cave in.

Merit Rating

This quest starts with <rgb=#FFFF00>full</rgb> Merit Rating.

<rgb=#FF0000>Major Point Loss</rgb>
* Barricade Destroyed

<rgb=#FF0000>Moderate Point Loss</rgb>
* Rohirrim captain defeated
* Rohirrim soldier defeated
Help the Rohirrim soldiers to defend the barricades and defeat the enemies coming from the cavern before Gimli is forced to cave in the entrance.
Protect the Crystal
Defeat the Troll Brute
Defeat all enemies and protect Gimli
<rgb=#FF0000>Gimli was forced to cave in the tunnel entrance.</rgb>
